import { Component, OnInit, } from '@angular/core'; import { Service1Service } from '../../Services/service1.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-body', templateUrl: './body.component.html', styleUrls: ['./body.component.css'] }) export class BodyComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private flipkartservice: Service1Service) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.Products(); } Array: any[] = []; Electronics:any[]=[]; Electronics2:any[]=[]; Campus:any[]=[]; Beauty:any[]=[]; Products() { this.flipkartservice.GetProducts().subscribe(res => { this.Array = res; console.log(this.Array) this.Electronics=[res[4],res[6],res[5],res[2]]; this.Electronics2=[res[13],res[11],res[3]]; this.Campus=[res[13],res[10],res[9],res[8],res[11],res[12],res[7]]; this.Beauty=[res[18],res[19],res[17],res[16],res[14],res[15]]; }) } }
